page.title: 07HEALTH, WELFARE, N CREAKE
page.content: There is no resident doctor; the surgery is at Burnham Market, three miles away, whose doctors visit the surrounding area three days a week. Renewal prescriptions are left for collection at the sub Post Office. The surgery has baby, post and ante natal clinics. There is a hospital car service. The nearest hospitals are at Kings Lynn, and at Norwich. Fakenham, seven miles away, has a dentist and chiropodist. The latter visits the over sixties each two months. There is a village hall, for local organisations, such over sixties club, youth club, or Womens Institute. There is a recreation ground, with plans to provide playing field equipment, tennis court and bowling green, to supplement the football and cricket pitches.
